title: Chestnut Chicken
description: Stir fry chicken with chestnuts and carrots (板栗烧鸡).

item8.ingredient: corn starch, mixed with 3 tbsp water

instructions.step1: Combine soy sauce, wine, chili, sesame oil and sugar in a measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Prepare veggies, and cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step3: Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in wok, add onion and carrot, saute for 10 minutes or until onion and carrots start to brown
instructions.step4: Add ginger, garlic and chestnuts, saute for a couple minutes
instructions.step5: Add chicken stock, bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer while cooking chicken
instructions.step6: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step7: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step8: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step9: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step10: Add chicken to mixture, stir to coat evenly, simmer uncovered for 5 minutes
instructions.step11: Add corn starch and simmer until desired thickness
instructions.step12: Serve over rice, garnish with cilantro

title: Chili Mango Chicken
description: Stir fry chicken with mango and bell pepper.

item3.ingredient: orange bell pepper, julienne or diced

instructions.step1: Combine soy sauce, Sriracha, wine, and sesame oil in a measuring cup and mix
instructions.step3: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step4: Add 2 tbsp oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step5: Heat 2 tbsp olive oil in wok, add shallots and peppers, saute for a few minutes
instructions.step6: Add ginger and garlic, saute for a couple minutes
instructions.step7: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step8: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step9: Add chicken and sauce mixture to wok, stir-fry for a couple minutes
instructions.step10: Add Mango and stir-fry for 1 minute
instructions.step11: Serve over rice, garnish with cilantro

title: Orange Chicken
description: Stir fry orange chicken loaded with veggies.

item2.ingredient: orange bell pepper, julienne or diced

instructions.step1: Combine orange sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Prepare veggies and place into wok
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn heat to medium for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to mixture, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave covered for a few minutes
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

title: Sesame Chicken
description: Stir fry sesame chicken with mushrooms.

instructions.step1: Add oils for sauce, shallots, and mushrooms to wok
instructions.step2: Combine the remaining sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step3: Add oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet, spread evenly and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn on wok to medium low, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to wok and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to wok, stir to coat evenly, turn off heat, leave uncovered for a few minutes
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

title: Szechuan Chicken
description: Stir fry Szechuan style chicken loaded with veggies.

item1.ingredient: red bell pepper, julienne or diced

item2.ingredient: jalapeno pepper, julienne or diced, green bell pepper can also be used

instructions.step1: Combine sauce ingredients in measuring cup and mix
instructions.step2: Add 2 tbsp oil to a wok, then layer onion, peppers, garlic and ginger
instructions.step3: Add 2 tbsp oil to large non-stick skillet and preheat over medium heat
instructions.step4: Cut chicken into pieces, trimming fat as required, coat with flour in plastic bag
instructions.step5: Place chicken into skillet and turn up heat to medium-high
instructions.step6: Turn heat to medium for veggies, stirring occasionally and kept covered
instructions.step7: Cook chicken until almost done, flipping once and breaking up bunches to ensure even cooking
instructions.step8: Add sauce mixture to veggies and bring to low boil
instructions.step9: Add chicken to wok and stir to coat evenly
instructions.step10: Serve over rice, garnish with sesame seeds and green onions

notes: To make this more traditionally, fry 2 tbsp Szechuan peppercorns and a handful of dried red chili's in the wok before adding the veggies.
